name: Virtual Machine Package
summary: Learn about .VPC7 files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: Virtual PC 7 used VPC7 files to bundle all data required to operate a virtual machine into a single package. This packaging system made it easier for users to manage, back up, or transfer virtual systems between Macs.
NOTE: VPC7 files replaced .VPC6 files created by version 6 of Virtual PC.

instructions: You can open VPC7 files with Parallels Desktop for Mac and VMware Fusion. To open a VPC7 file with either program, select File â†’ Open. Microsoft Virtual PC 7 also supports VPC7 files, but the software is discontinued.
